EmailTemplate.name: Secondary ASA option booklet
EmailTemplate.subject: Secondary ASA option booklet
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Please click here to find attached the ASA option booklet for the ASA block 3 which runs from Monday, 14th January to Thursday, 14th March.
Students should select their first and second choices for each day and this should be completed by Monday, January 7th.
Regards,
Mr. Iain Ruck Head of Secondary The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education _________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Member of The Federation of British International School of South East Asia - Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Chinese Ministry of Education
